title: Abusive Feedback

en: The next bout of feedback from your beta testers is harsh and mean - almost visceral. The person is telling you that you shouldn't even be alive and your product is trash.
The heck? How did this person make it into the project? And what are you supposed to do about it?

yes_caption: Delete the e-mail and move on

en: You delete the e-mail and try to move on, but some of the more specific jabs dug at your insecurities. For weeks, they pop into your mind at random.
Dominique immediately removes them from the project. Apparently, they came from a "trollish" Internet chat board. That explains that.
